name: Mitigation Playbook for Malicious PowerShell Script Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker exploited a vulnerability to execute a malicious PowerShell script and establish a reverse shell connection.

action--2b15073d-4e79-4de2-bb3b-15812ccf.name: Kill malicious process
action--2b15073d-4e79-4de2-bb3b-15812ccf.description: Terminate the malicious PowerShell process currently executing.

action--59c93b3a-ddde-4cb8-8ea3-1e4f5ad2.name: Block outgoing traffic to the malicious IP
action--59c93b3a-ddde-4cb8-8ea3-1e4f5ad2.description: Block all outgoing traffic to the external malicious IP address.

while-condition--abcde456-7890-abcd-ef12.name: Scan and clean infected files loop
while-condition--abcde456-7890-abcd-ef12.description: Keep scanning the system for infections until none are detected.

action--6f3b3f1e-ef59-4f51-82d6-98278f3f.name: Scan and clean infected files
action--6f3b3f1e-ef59-4f51-82d6-98278f3f.description: Perform a scan on the entire filesystem and remove infected files.

action--ab348cd4-425d-4df5-84cb-578afb67.name: Patch operating system vulnerability
action--ab348cd4-425d-4df5-84cb-578afb67.description: Ensure the operating system is updated to prevent further exploitation.

required_version.description: The minimum required version to mitigate the vulnerability.

action--d5f68f79-8b45-4cdb-9d42-4c3ffecd.description: Set the execution policy to restrict PowerShell script execution.
